components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To ETL Network In Laos

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS Delivery Delays To ETL Network In Laos. Our engineers continue to work with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 March 2025 at 16:15 PDT until 15 March 2025 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap
CARRIER NETWORK - Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance over Silver Spring Datacenter from 15 March 2025 at 17:00 PDT until 15 March 2025 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset long code and toll free numbers. There will be no service impact for customers connected via TLS and those connected to our Seattle Datacenter.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Messaging Channels - Maintenance

incident_updates.body: We’re conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 20:00 and 20:30 Pacific Time on 03/18/2025. During the maintenance window, WhatsApp, RCS & Facebook Messenger Inbound and Outbound Messages will experience a delay of about 5 minutes & outbound messages with validity period < 100 seconds will fail with error code 30036. Any Whatsapp, RCS & Facebook Messenger Sender creation, update, or deletion requests will fail during the outage window and must be retried later.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - Messaging Channels
